title: Styling for DAOscan
body: Add some styling to DAOscan (in current version)

title: Texts for landingspage
body:
Review & add the text for the my-dao-dashboard-landingspage (visual example on bottom):

_TO REVIEW!_

**Gear up, get DAO’ing.**
In the fast-paced world of decentralized autonomous 
organizations, we need a single app to keep up to 
speed and tune in to all activity surrounding these 
instruments of decentralisation.
(link) Enter My DAO Dashboard.

•

**Participate or watch.**
Apart from the DAO’s your participating in, you can also easily add some to your watchlist and observe their activity.

**Vote in-app.**
See all active and passive proposals for each DAO, and execute the DAO’s most prominent feature, voting, directly in the app. 

**Take the pulse.**
All key-metrics of your all of your DAO’s will be visible in the app, making sure you know what’s going on in each DAO.

(button)go to My DAO Dashboard

•

These DAO-protocols will be supported in the app.
Are we missing an important one? Let us know!

•

**My DAO Dashboard**
Originated at EthBerlinZwei, My DAO Dashboard is an open source 
community, aiming to contribute value to the decentralized 
world by creating  useful tools for managing DAO’s.

(link)Wanna join? Reach out!
Find us on these platforms:
_____

_TO ADD!_

[Text about 'DAO Scan']
[Text about 'My DAO Dashboard']



_VISUAL EXAMPLE:_
![MDD_landingspage](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/51742196/74036413-84dd5b00-49bc-11ea-8908-aaa29e9f80f0.png)

title: Analytics: GoatScanner
body:
Goal: have some stats.

It's free and privacy preserving, so should be all right.

title: [BUG] DAO balance not properly calculated
body:
**Describe the issue**
DAO balances are not well calculated for `0xf632Ce27Ea72deA30d30C1A9700B6b3bCeAA05cF`. The last DAO should have a balance of 252.7 DAIs.

![Screenshot from 2020-01-22 19-16-42](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/931684/72928170-cbde1600-3d57-11ea-91da-3fb2f935e0e1.png)


**Steps to Reproduce**
Go to to https://mydaodashboard.com/ and connect with `0xf632Ce27Ea72deA30d30C1A9700B6b3bCeAA05cF` account.

**Expected behavior**
It should count DAIs + SAIs on [this DAO](https://mainnet.aragon.org/#/0x8110489e2c26c7a4c6679e64a1563355135ddf11/0x2c96165c464809353f4423d30ad3ed47dd12a348/).

![Screenshot from 2020-01-22 20-45-15](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/931684/72928371-2aa38f80-3d58-11ea-886c-73ee9b13b1e7.png)

**Actual behavior**
It displays previous DAO balance.

Notice that beehive is shown twice because I have BEE and HONEY tokens, both tokens from the Behive DAO. Probably that DAO should be only shown once.

**Environment**

https://mydaodashboard.com/ and https://my-dao-dashboard.herokuapp.com/

**Additional data**
N/A

title: Bennisan86/styling on currentapp
body: This PR sets the current version of the app in the new styling.

title: If I own MKR, show me MakerDAO Governance Votes [REQ]
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

I own MKR tokens, which means that I am a participant in MakerDAO, and their governance processes for monetary policy.

If I load mydaodashboard, it does not show me information about MakerDAO's votes.

**Describe the solution you'd like**

I would like to see MakerDAO in my list of DAOs on mydaodashboard

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

None.

**Additional context**

More details on MakerDAO's governance processes are here: https://vote.makerdao.com

title: Don't load "Sealed Proposals" by default [REQ]
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

The page takes a long time to load all the "Sealed Proposals".

In many ways, this information is no longer so relevant for a participant, as they are unable to influence these decisions any more.

So, it seems a shame to slow them down from being able to see the things that they can influence.

**Describe the solution you'd like**

Remove "Sealed Proposals" all together - those votes have passed. Also, they are accessible by going to the DAO's page itself.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

For the dashboard to only load "Active Proposals" by default, and then for there to be a button for a user to press to also load "Sealed Proposals" if they want to.

**Additional context**

The list of "Sealed Proposals" is going to get bigger and bigger and bigger, and this is going to mean that loading it is going to get slower and slower and slower :)

title: Show Aragon Core Governance DAOs to holders of ANT [REQ]
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

I hold ANT, but mydaodashboard.com does not show Aragon's Core Governance DAOs in the list of DAOs that I participate in.

**Describe the solution you'd like**

I would like it if mydaodashboard was able to show me all the DAOs that I am able to participate in, by virtue of me owning ANT.

Currently, if I am a holder of ANT, I am technically a member of all (currently 2) Aragon's core governance DAOs - i.e. the ones which govern how Aragon works, and how the funds raised during the ICO are allocated.

Specifically, if I own ANT, then I currently have the power to vote in these DAOs:

https://mainnet.aragon.org/#/governance.aragonproject.eth
https://mainnet.aragon.org/#/agp10

I would like for these DAOs (and any future DAOs which use ANT as voting tokens) to appear in My DAO Dashboard.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

I can continue to organically discover all the DAOs that my ownership of ANT allows me to participate in.

**Additional context**

More details here: https://aragon.org/project/governance/

title: Sort Participating DAOs by... [REQ]
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

I have too many DAOs, and I'm having difficulty prioritising them.

**Describe the solution you'd like**

I would like to be able to sort my DAOs by different metrics, so that the most important ones for me appear higher than less important ones.

e.g. I would like to be able to sort my DAOs based on

`Balance x Voting Power`

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

Scroll through to find the DAOs that I want to keep track of.

**Additional context**

This is what it looks like with only 10 DAOs. Imagine how it will look with 100! Yikes!

![Screenshot from 2019-09-30 13-34-16](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2212651/65878958-168de980-e387-11e9-8516-691e20d22ba1.png)

title: [REQ] Did you think about creating some kind of Voting capability of your Dapp?
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
A clear and concise description of what the problem is. Ex. I'm always frustrated when [...]

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Because some DAO's are heavy loaded and it would be very useful to vote out of your DApp without loading the whole Aragon DAO

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
Just use fast caching solutions for Aragon to load faster

**Additional context**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.

title: Leverage MetaMask token API
body:
MetaMask provides special [API](https://metamask.github.io/metamask-docs/Main_Concepts/Best_Practices/Registering_Your_Token) or [EIP747](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-747.md)  for registering tokens. We might use that to display participation in the DAOs without going to the dashboard.

Crazy idea: propose to extend the API with url to management dashboard.

title: Blockchain DAO Parser
body: Instead of creating list of DAOs right in the browser, we might involve caching this information off-line, or use The Graph protocol for querying this.

title: User Analytics
body:
As a person related to development of the dashboard, I would like to have a data-enabled view over what people are doing with the dashboard. The dashboard is quite sensitive, so Google Analytics or something like this is not an option. Options I found:
- https://matomo.org
- https://github.com/Countly/countly-server

title: Login via WalletConnect in addition to MetaMask
Extend attached proposals
body: If a vote proposal includes a link to GitHub Gist, Dropbox Paper or GDrive, we should embed the appropriate document in a vote page.

title: Discussion board for votes
body: On a vote page, add ability for members to discuss the proposal.

title: Way to add DAO to the list?
body:
A user should have a way to propose a DAO for inclusion in the list, if it has not been automatically discovered.

Requires more details and thinking.

title: Store DAOs in local storage
body:
**Goal:** Increase responsiveness.

**Proposed solution:**
Store a list of DAOs in local storage, as to avoid initial loading time. If a user loads the dashboard for the second time, her list of DAOs is preloaded from local storage, and then updated from blockchain.

title: Gather build size metrics

labels.name: cdn
labels.description: Related to delivery over the internet

body: On course to optimise a build size, one first have to gather appropriate metrics before doing anything. Figure a way to track increase or decrease in build size.

title: Replace ApolloClient with nanographql: Smaller build

labels.name: cdn
labels.description: Related to delivery over the internet

body: With a goal of faster loading, replace ApolloClient with nanographql or alternative. This reduces build size.

title: Consider CDN for faster loading

labels.name: cdn
labels.description: Related to delivery over the internet

body: One of the priorities is fast loading. CDN could decrease time of load a bit.

title: Use GitHub Actions instead of Travis
body:
Migrate Travis build mechanism onto GitHub Actions.
Reasons:
- Fancy new tech
- GitHub serves as a single source of truth regarding builds
- One less service to track stuff

title: Dynamic Moloch DAO discovery
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
Right now MolochDAO and Metacartel are hard-coded. Other DAO's based on the same contracts are not shown in the dashboard.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Add all MolochDAO-based DAO's to the dashboard.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
Alternatively, we can start by adding a full list of all currently available MolochDAO-based DAO's (Yang, etc.).

Also check-out DAOHaus https://daohaus.club/

title: Dark mode
body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**
I'd like to have the dashboard available in Dark mode. 

**Additional context**
As long as we use ant.design, check out https://github.com/ant-design/ant-design-dark-theme
